languages.text: "Приятно видеть, что Вольные Торговцы все же способны сотрудничать. Это убеждает меня в том, что вы являетесь достойн{mf|ым|ой} кандидатом для миссии, которую я собираюсь вам поручить".
"I am pleased to see that Rogue Traders can indeed work together. This serves as proof that you are a worthy candidate for the mission that I am about to give you."
languages.original_text: "Приятно видеть, что Вольные Торговцы все же способны сотрудничать. Это убеждает меня в том, что вы являетесь достойн{mf|ым|ой} кандидатом для миссии, которую я собираюсь вам поручить".

traits.locale_text: "I am pleased to see that Rogue Traders can indeed work together. This serves as proof that you are a worthy candidate for the mission that I am about to give you."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

traits.locale_text: "I am pleased to see that Rogue Traders can indeed work together. This serves as proof that you are a worthy candidate for the mission that I am about to give you."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

traits.locale_text: "I am pleased to see that Rogue Traders can indeed work together. This serves as proof that you are a worthy candidate for the mission that I am about to give you."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

traits.locale_text: "I am pleased to see that Rogue Traders can indeed work together. This serves as proof that you are a worthy candidate for the mission that I am about to give you."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: “行商浪人之间确实可以合作，这让我非常满意。这足以证明你是位合适的人选，可以完成我接下来要交给你的任务。”
languages.original_text: "I am pleased to see that Rogue Traders can indeed work together. This serves as proof that you are a worthy candidate for the mission that I am about to give you."

traits.locale_text: “行商浪人之间确实可以合作，这让我非常满意。这足以证明你是位合适的人选，可以完成我接下来要交给你的任务。”
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: «Me alegro de ver que los Comerciantes Independientes sí son capaces de colaborar. Esto demuestra que es {mf|el|la} candidat{mf|o|a} adecuad{mf|o|a} para la misión que estoy a punto de encomendarle».
languages.original_text: "I am pleased to see that Rogue Traders can indeed work together. This serves as proof that you are a worthy candidate for the mission that I am about to give you."

traits.locale_text: «Me alegro de ver que los Comerciantes Independientes sí son capaces de colaborar. Esto demuestra que es {mf|el|la} candidat{mf|o|a} adecuad{mf|o|a} para la misión que estoy a punto de encomendarle».
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: 「自由開拓者が確かに協力し合えることが分かったのは喜ばしい。お前がこれから授ける聖務の候補者にふさわしいと証明するに足る出来事だ」
languages.original_text: "I am pleased to see that Rogue Traders can indeed work together. This serves as proof that you are a worthy candidate for the mission that I am about to give you."

traits.locale_text: 「自由開拓者が確かに協力し合えることが分かったのは喜ばしい。お前がこれから授ける聖務の候補者にふさわしいと証明するに足る出来事だ」
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: « C'est un plaisir de voir deux {mf|libres-marchands|libres-marchandes} collaborer aussi bien. J'y vois la preuve que vous êtes {mf|le candidat idéal|la candidate idéale} pour la mission que je m'apprête à vous confier. »
languages.original_text: "I am pleased to see that Rogue Traders can indeed work together. This serves as proof that you are a worthy candidate for the mission that I am about to give you."

traits.locale_text: « C'est un plaisir de voir deux {mf|libres-marchands|libres-marchandes} collaborer aussi bien. J'y vois la preuve que vous êtes {mf|le candidat idéal|la candidate idéale} pour la mission que je m'apprête à vous confier. »
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: "Ich sehe mit Freuden, dass Freihändler tatsächlich kooperieren können. Das beweist mir, dass Ihr {mf|ein würdiger Kandidat|eine würdige Kandidatin} für die Mission seid, mit der ich Euch betrauen werde."
languages.original_text: "I am pleased to see that Rogue Traders can indeed work together. This serves as proof that you are a worthy candidate for the mission that I am about to give you."

traits.locale_text: "Ich sehe mit Freuden, dass Freihändler tatsächlich kooperieren können. Das beweist mir, dass Ihr {mf|ein würdiger Kandidat|eine würdige Kandidatin} für die Mission seid, mit der ich Euch betrauen werde."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: "Hür Tacirlerin birlikte çalışabildiğini görmek güzel. Bu durum, sana birazdan vereceğim göreve layık olduğunu gösteriyor."
languages.original_text: "I am pleased to see that Rogue Traders can indeed work together. This serves as proof that you are a worthy candidate for the mission that I am about to give you."
